Header.title: Professional web development
Header.paragraph: End-to-end software design, development and deployment

About.paragraph: I'm a full stack web developer with over 20 years of industry experience.
Why: Experienced with the latest front end frameworks

Strengths.title: Front end frameworks
Strengths.text: React, Vue.js, Redux.  Web components. Micro front-end architectures.

Strengths.title: SEO
Strengths.text: Server-side rendered web applications using Node.js for search engine indexable pages.

Strengths.title: Performance
Strengths.text: Performance tuning across the stack for the fastest loading and most responsive pages.

Strengths.title: REST APIs
Strengths.text: REST API development using SQL and NoSQL databases.
